const EventEmitter = require('events');

const EVENTS = {

};

// èµ„æºè·¯å¾„
// å½“å‰é¡¹ç›® dev:app æ„å»ºå‡ºæ¥çš„ èµ„æºç›®å½•

// uniapp Android ç¦»çº¿æ‰“åŒ… èµ„æºç›®å½•
const ANDROID_ASSETS_DIR = 'F:\\uniapp_offline_android\\app\\src\\main\\assets\\apps\\__UNI__XXXXXX\\www'; 

// å¤åˆ¶æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹æ–¹æ³•
const copyFolderSync = (source, target) => {
  // åˆ›å»ºç›®æ ‡æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹
  if (!fs.existsSync(target)) {
    fs.mkdirSync(target);
  }
  // éå†æºæ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ä¸­çš„æ¯ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶æˆ–å­æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹
  fs.readdirSync(source).forEach((file) => {
    // æ„é€ æºæ–‡ä»¶/æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹çš„å®Œæ•´è·¯å¾„
    const sourcePath = path.join(source, file);
    // æ„é€ ç›®æ ‡æ–‡ä»¶/æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹çš„å®Œæ•´è·¯å¾„
    const targetPath = path.join(target, file);
    // è·å–æ–‡ä»¶/æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹çš„è¯¦ç»†ä¿¡æ¯
    const stat = fs.statSync(sourcePath);
    if (stat.isFile()) {
        // å¦‚æœæ˜¯æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œåˆ™ç›´æ¥å¤åˆ¶æ–‡ä»¶
        fs.copyFileSync(sourcePath, targetPath);
    } else if (stat.isDirectory()) {
        // å¦‚æœæ˜¯æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ï¼Œåˆ™é€’å½’å¤åˆ¶æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹
        copyFolderSync(sourcePath, targetPath);
    }
  });
});

// å¤åˆ¶èµ„æº

    copyFolderSync(RUN_DIR, ANDROID_ASSETS_DIR);

    event.emit(EVENTS.RUN);
